mapper.select:
SELECT snd703b.STDR_YM AS stdrYm /* 기준년월 */ , snd703b.DPRT_CD AS dprtCd /* 부점코드 */ , snd703b.RGST_SN AS rgstSn /* 등록일련번호 */ , snd703b.RPTS_IEM_MNGM_NO AS rptsIemMngmNo /* 보고서항목관리번호 */ , snd703b.CMP_NM AS cmpNm /* 회사명 */ , snd703b.FSS_CMP_CD AS fssCmpCd /* 금융감독원회사코드 */ , snd703b.WRTN_STDR_DT AS wrtnStdrDt /* 작성기준일자 */ , snd703b.ETC_RPTS_INV_SHP_CD AS etcRptsInvShpCd /* 기타보고서투자형태코드 */ , snd703b.ETC_RPTS_INV_DETL_CD AS etcRptsInvDetlCd /* 기타보고서투자상세코드 */ , snd703b.PF_THCS_DCD AS pfThcsDcd /* PF해당구분코드 */ , snd703b.SOC_THCS_DCD AS socThcsDcd /* SOC해당구분코드 */ , snd703b.INV_DT AS invDt /* 투자일자 */ , snd703b.CTRT_END_DT AS ctrtEndDt /* 계약종료일자 */ , snd703b.RLES_TP_DCD AS rlesTpDcd /* 부동산유형구분코드 */ , snd703b.PF_SLLT_TP_DCD AS pfSlltTpDcd /* PF분양유형구분코드 */ , snd703b.PF_ERN_TP_DCD AS pfErnTpDcd /* PF수익유형구분코드 */ , snd703b.BSS_ASST_LCTP_DCD AS bssAsstLctpDcd /* 기초자산소재지구분코드 */ , snd703b.NTN_NM AS ntnNm /* 국가명 */ , snd703b.OVRS_LCT_CTY_NM AS ovrsLctCtyNm /* 해외소재도시명 */ , snd703b.RLES_LCTP_ZPCD AS rlesLctpZpcd /* 부동산소재지우편번호 */ , snd703b.FND_NM AS fndNm /* 펀드명 */ , snd703b.KOFIA_FND_CD AS kofiaFndCd /* 금융투자협회펀드코드 */ , snd703b.ASST_MGCO_NM AS asstMgcoNm /* 자산운용사명 */ , snd703b.FOFS_THCS_DCD AS fofsThcsDcd /* 재간접펀드해당구분코드 */ , snd703b.BDFND_THCS_DCD AS bdfndThcsDcd /* 블라인드펀드해당구분코드 */ , snd703b.FND_INV_AMT AS fndInvAmt /* 펀드투자금액 */ , snd703b.FND_TOT_EVL_AMT AS fndTotEvlAmt /* 펀드총평가금액 */ , snd703b.FND_ETC_RPTS_PBFF_PPLC_DCD AS fndEtcRptsPbffPplcDcd /* 펀드기타보고서공모사모구분코드 */ , snd703b.FND_ETC_RPTS_CRRY_CD AS fndEtcRptsCrryCd /* 펀드기타보고서통화코드 */ , snd703b.REITS_NM AS reitsNm /* 리츠명 */ , snd703b.REITS_AMT AS reitsAmt /* 리츠금액 */ , snd703b.REITS_EVL_AMT AS reitsEvlAmt /* 리츠평가금액 */ , snd703b.REITS_ETC_RPTS_PBFF_PPLC_DCD AS reitsEtcRptsPbffPplcDcd /* 리츠기타보고서공모사모구분코드 */ , snd703b.REITS_ETC_RPTS_CRRY_CD AS reitsEtcRptsCrryCd /* 리츠기타보고서통화코드 */ , snd703b.LQDZ_SCTY_NM AS lqdzSctyNm /* 유동화증권명 */ , snd703b.LQDZ_SCTY_KND_CD AS lqdzSctyKndCd /* 유동화증권종류코드 */ , snd703b.LQDZ_SCTY_ISU_ISTT_NM AS lqdzSctyIsuIsttNm /* 유동화증권발행기관명 */ , snd703b.LQDZ_SCTY_CRNO AS lqdzSctyCrno /* 유동화증권법인등록번호 */ , snd703b.ISU_DT AS isuDt /* 발행일자 */ , snd703b.PAR_AMT AS parAmt /* 액면금액 */ , snd703b.LQDZ_SCTY_ISU_INTRT AS lqdzSctyIsuIntrt /* 유동화증권발행금리 */ , snd703b.CRDT_RIFC_CMP_NM AS crdtRifcCmpNm /* 신용보강회사명 */ , snd703b.CRDT_RIFC_CMP_CRNO AS crdtRifcCmpCrno /* 신용보강회사법인등록번호 */ , snd703b.RPTS_CTRT_TP_CD AS rptsCtrtTpCd /* 보고서계약유형코드 */ , snd703b.SQ1_ETC_RPTS_CRDT_GRD_CD AS sq1EtcRptsCrdtGrdCd /* 1차기타보고서신용등급코드 */ , snd703b.SQ2_ETC_RPTS_CRDT_GRD_CD AS sq2EtcRptsCrdtGrdCd /* 2차기타보고서신용등급코드 */ , snd703b.ETC_CTRT_NM AS etcCtrtNm /* 기타계약명 */ , snd703b.TR_OTHR_NM AS trOthrNm /* 거래상대방명 */ , snd703b.INV_PRNA AS invPrna /* 투자원금 */ , snd703b.ETC_EVL_AMT AS etcEvlAmt /* 기타평가금액 */ , snd703b.NCR_RSK_VL AS ncrRskVl /* NCR위험값 */ , snd703b.NCR_RSK_AMT AS ncrRskAmt /* NCR위험금액 */ , snd703b.JOB_CHRR_NM AS jobChrrNm /* 업무담당자명 */ , snd703b.DPT_NM AS dptNm /* 부서명 */ , snd703b.CPLC_CTNS AS cplcCtns /* 연락처내용 */ , snd703b.HND_DETL_DTM AS hndDetlDtm /* 조작상세일시 */ , snd703b.HND_EMPNO AS hndEmpno /* 조작사원번호 */ , snd703b.HND_TMNL_NO AS hndTmnlNo /* 조작단말기번호 */ , snd703b.HND_TR_ID AS hndTrId /* 조작거래ID */ , snd703b.GUID AS guid /* GUID */ FROM IBIMS703B snd703b WHERE snd703b.DPRT_CD LIKE #{dptCd} AND snd703b.STDR_YM LIKE CASE WHEN NOT EXISTS( SELECT s703b_1.STDR_YM FROM IBIMS703B s703b_1 WHERE s703b_1.STDR_YM = #{stdrYm} ) THEN #{stdrYm} ELSE #{prvStdrYm} END UNION SELECT /* , T.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_LCLS_CD AS rptsCtrtTpCd 계약유형1 (유동성/신용공여형) = 기업여신상품대분류코드 */ /* , NVL(s002b_1.CD_VL_NM , '') AS PRDT_LCLS_CD_NM 기업여신상품대분류코드명 */ /* , T.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_MDCL_CD AS rptsCtrtTpDetlCd 계약유형2 (매입약정 등) = 기업여신상품중분류코드 */ /* , NVL(s002b_2.CD_VL_NM , '') AS PRDT_MDCL_CD_NM 기업여신상품중분류코드명 */ /* , T.EPRZ_CRDL_CTRC_AMT AS frsCtrcAmt 최초 약정금액 */ /* , CASE WHEN T.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_LCLS_CD = '90' THEN T.DEAL_EXC_BLCE 상품대분류(90:대출)-->SUM(대출잔액) */ /* ELSE T.EPRZ_CRDL_CTRC_AMT 상품대분류(90:대출) 그외 -->기업여신약정금액 */ /* END AS eprzCrdlNowCtrcBlce 약정잔액*/ /* , T.PF_LOAN_YN AS PF_LOAN_YN PF대출여부*/ /* , A.PRDT_NM AS prdtNm 계약명칭 */ /* , T.CTRC_DT AS ctrtDt 계약일 */ /* , T.CTRC_EXP_DT AS expDt 만기일자 */
NULL AS stdrYm /* 기준년월 */ , NULL AS dprtCd /* 부점코드 */ , NULL AS rgstSn /* 등록일련번호 */ , NULL AS rptsIemMngmNo /* 보고서항목관리번호 */ , NVL( (SELECT MAX(B1.ENTP_HNGL_NM) FROM IBIMS114B B1 WHERE B1.BSNS_RGST_NO = A.TR_OTHR_DSCM_NO), '') AS cmpNm /* 회사명 */ , NULL AS fssCmpCd /* 금융감독원회사코드 */ , NULL AS wrtnStdrDt /* 작성기준일자 */ , NULL AS etcRptsInvShpCd /* 기타보고서투자형태코드 */ , NULL AS etcRptsInvDetlCd /* 기타보고서투자상세코드 */ , NULL AS pfThcsDcd /* PF해당구분코드 */ , NULL AS socThcsDcd /* SOC해당구분코드 */ , NULL AS invDt /* 투자일자 */ , NULL AS ctrtEndDt /* 계약종료일자 */ , NULL AS rlesTpDcd /* 부동산유형구분코드 */ , NULL AS pfSlltTpDcd /* PF분양유형구분코드 */ , NULL AS pfErnTpDcd /* PF수익유형구분코드 */ , NULL AS bssAsstLctpDcd /* 기초자산소재지구분코드 */ , NULL AS ntnNm /* 국가명 */ , NULL AS ovrsLctCtyNm /* 해외소재도시명 */ , NULL AS rlesLctpZpcd /* 부동산소재지우편번호 */ , NULL AS fndNm /* 펀드명 */ , NULL AS kofiaFndCd /* 금융투자협회펀드코드 */ , NULL AS asstMgcoNm /* 자산운용사명 */ , NULL AS fofsThcsDcd /* 재간접펀드해당구분코드 */ , NULL AS bdfndThcsDcd /* 블라인드펀드해당구분코드 */ , NULL AS fndInvAmt /* 펀드투자금액 */ , NULL AS fndTotEvlAmt /* 펀드총평가금액 */ , NULL AS fndEtcRptsPbffPplcDcd /* 펀드기타보고서공모사모구분코드 */ , NULL AS fndEtcRptsCrryCd /* 펀드기타보고서통화코드 */ , NULL AS reitsNm /* 리츠명 */ , NULL AS reitsAmt /* 리츠금액 */ , NULL AS reitsEvlAmt /* 리츠평가금액 */ , NULL AS reitsEtcRptsPbffPplcDcd /* 리츠기타보고서공모사모구분코드 */ , NULL AS reitsEtcRptsCrryCd /* 리츠기타보고서통화코드 */ , NULL AS lqdzSctyNm /* 유동화증권명 */ , NULL AS lqdzSctyKndCd /* 유동화증권종류코드 */ , NULL AS lqdzSctyIsuIsttNm /* 유동화증권발행기관명 */ , NULL AS lqdzSctyCrno /* 유동화증권법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS isuDt /* 발행일자 */ , NULL AS parAmt /* 액면금액 */ , NULL AS lqdzSctyIsuIntrt /* 유동화증권발행금리 */ , NULL AS crdtRifcCmpNm /* 신용보강회사명 */ , NULL AS crdtRifcCmpCrno /* 신용보강회사법인등록번호 */ , NULL AS rptsCtrtTpCd /* 보고서계약유형코드 */ , NULL AS sq1EtcRptsCrdtGrdCd /* 1차기타보고서신용등급코드 */ , NULL AS sq2EtcRptsCrdtGrdCd /* 2차기타보고서신용등급코드 */ , NULL AS etcCtrtNm /* 기타계약명 */ , NULL AS trOthrNm /* 거래상대방명 */ , NULL AS invPrna /* 투자원금 */ , NULL AS etcEvlAmt /* 기타평가금액 */ , NULL AS ncrRskVl /* NCR위험값 */ , NULL AS ncrRskAmt /* NCR위험금액 */ , NULL AS jobChrrNm /* 업무담당자명 */ , NULL AS dptNm /* 부서명 */ , NULL AS cplcCtns /* 연락처내용 */ , NULL AS hndDetlDtm /* 조작상세일시 */ , NULL AS hndEmpno /* 조작사원번호 */ , NULL AS hndTmnlNo /* 조작단말기번호 */ , NULL AS hndTrId /* 조작거래ID */ , NULL AS guid /* GUID */ FROM IBIMS201B A /* 딜승인기본 */ , ( SELECT T1.PRDT_CD , T1.CTRC_DT , T1.CTRC_EXP_DT , T1.EPRZ_CRDL_CTRC_AMT /* 기업여신약정금액*/ , T1.PF_LOAN_YN /* PF대출여부*/ , T1.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_LCLS_CD /* 기업여신상품대분류코드 */ , T1.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_MDCL_CD /* 기업여신상품중분류코드 */ , SUM(T2.DEAL_EXC_BLCE) AS DEAL_EXC_BLCE /* 약정잔액 */ FROM IBIMS401B T1 /* 딜약정기본 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN IBIMS402B T2 /* 딜실행기본 */ ON T1.PRDT_CD = T2.PRDT_CD AND T2.LDG_STTS_CD = '1' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.EPRZ_CRDL_LDG_STTS_CD = '1' GROUP BY T1.PRDT_CD , T1.CTRC_DT , T1.CTRC_EXP_DT , T1.EPRZ_CRDL_CTRC_AMT /* 기업여신약정금액*/ , T1.PF_LOAN_YN /* PF대출여부*/ , T1.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_LCLS_CD /* 기업여신상품대분류코드 */ , T1.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_MDCL_CD /* 기업여신상품중분류코드 */ ) T LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_1 ON T.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_LCLS_CD = s002b_1.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_1.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'E022' LEFT JOIN IBIMS002B s002b_2 ON T.EPRZ_CRDL_PRDT_MDCL_CD = s002b_2.CD_VL_ID AND s002b_2.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'E023' WHERE A.LAST_YN = '1' AND A.PRDT_CD = T.PRDT_CD AND A.FRS_MNGM_BDCD LIKE #{dptCd} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT s703b_2.DPRT_CD FROM IBIMS703B s703b_2 WHERE s703b_2.DPRT_CD = A.FRS_MNGM_BDCD )
